channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- Mendix Applications using Mendix 7
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- Mendix Applications using Mendix 7

item.title: CVE-2023-23835|2023-02-15T09:24:58.910Z -- siemens -- mendix%20applications%20using%20mendix%207
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in Mendix Applications using Mendix 7 (All versions < V7.23.34), Mendix Applications using Mendix 8 (All versions < V8.18.23), Mendix Applications using Mendix 9 (All versions < V9.22.0), Mendix Applications using Mendix 9 (V9.12) (All versions < V9.12.10), Mendix Applications using Mendix 9 (V9.18) (All versions < V9.18.4), Mendix Applications using Mendix 9 (V9.6) (All versions < V9.6.15). Some of the Mendix runtime APIâ€™s allow attackers to bypass XPath constraints and retrieve information using XPath queries that trigger errors.
